name: Space Police Simulator Platinum
description:
Serve as a policer officer on a floating platform in another galaxy and make space a better place!

  • Lifelike police & space platform simulation
  • 256 different types of aliens composed of four (!) unique alien supertypes
  • Lots of thieves, saboteurs and forgers – find them all and do it quick, or the citizens might get impatient!
  • Featuring an unique soundtrack of jazzy space disco tunes played by a guy who owns a real keyboard and almost finished "Keyboard Starter 1"

Made for Ludum Dare 47 (theme: "Stuck in a Loop").
